path_robot_positions.help: Path to file with predefined robot positions.

path_homography_points.help: Path to file defining world coordinates of april tags.

path_camera_config.help: Path to file containing camera configuration.

mode.help: Selection of default mode. '0' or undefined mode allows mode selection, '1', '2' and '3' start specified program immediately.

auto_exit.help: If True, the script exits after stopping the program. If False, mode selection appears after stopping the program.

detection_stop.help: If True, the script will delete all detections if Operational Stop is enabled in the PLC.

detector_type.help: Selection of object detector. Valid values are 'NN1', 'NN2' and 'HSV'.

verbose.help: If extra information should be printed to the console.

homography_frame_count.help: Number of frames between homography updates.

frame_limit.help: Number of frames object must be tracked for to start pick & place.

packet_depths.help: List of minimal expected depth sizes in millimeters of each packet type. Index corresponds to type of packet.

min_pick_distance.help: Minimal x position in millimeters for packet picking.

max_pick_distance.help: Maximal x position in millimeters for packet picking.

z_offset.help: Z height offset from pick height for all positions except for pick position.

x_pick_offset.help: X offset between prepick and pick position.

grip_time_offset.help: X offset from current packet position to prepick position.

pick_start_x_offset.help: Offset between robot and packet for starting the pick move.

max_z.help: Highest allowed gripper position above conveyor belt in millimeters.

min_y.help: Y coordinate of side of the conveyor belt closer to robot base in millimeters.

max_y.help: Y coordinate of side of the conveyor belt further from robot base in millimeters.

tracker_frames_to_deregister.help: Number of frames after which the packet is deregistered.

tracker_guard.help: When packet depth is cropped, the resulting crop will have this many extra pixels on each side.

tracker_max_item_distance.help: Maximal distance which packet can travel when it disappears in frame pixels.

pos_est_visualize.help: If results of position estimator should be visualized.

pos_est_center_switch.help: Defines the center of the gripper. Valid values are 'mass' and 'height'.

pos_est_gripper_radius.help: Radius of the gripper in meters.

pos_est_gripper_ration.help: Ratio of gripper radius for detecting the gripper annulus.

pos_est_max_num_tries.help: Maximal number of tries to estimate the optimal gripper position.

pos_est_height_th.help: Distance between camera and belt in meters.

pos_est_num_bins.help: Number of bins for height thresholding (20 is good enough, 10 works as well).

pos_est_blacklist_radius.help: Distance for blacklisting points in the position estimator.

nn1_pipeline_config.help: Path to NN1 detector configuration file.

nn1_labelmap.help: Path to NN1 detector labelmap file.

nn1_checkpoint.help: Name of NN1 detector checkpoint to be used.

nn1_max_detections.help: Maximal ammount of concurrent detections in an image when detecting using the NN1 detector.

nn1_detection_threshold.help: Minimal confidence for detected object to be labeled as a packet when detecting using the NN1 detector. Number beween 0 and 1.

nn2_weights.help: Path to NN2 detector weights file.

nn2_img_size.help: The image size for validation when using the NN2 detector.

hsv_ignore_vertical.help: Number of rows of pixels ignored from top and bottom of the image frame when using HSV detector.

hsv_ignore_horizontal.help: Number of columns of pixels ignored from left and right of the image frame when using HSV detector.

hsv_max_ratio_error.help: When checking squareness of the packet, the HSV detector allows the ratio of packet sides to be off by this ammount.

hsv_white_lower.help: List of 3 integer values representing Hue (0 to 179), Saturation (0 to 255), Value (0 to 255) of bottom threshold for white color when using the HSV detector.

hsv_white_upper.help: List of 3 integer values representing Hue (0 to 179), Saturation (0 to 255), Value (0 to 255) of top threshold for white color when using the HSV detector.

hsv_brown_lower.help: List of 3 integer values representing Hue (0 to 179), Saturation (0 to 255), Value (0 to 255) of bottom threshold for brown color when using the HSV detector.

hsv_brown_upper.help: List of 3 integer values representing Hue (0 to 179), Saturation (0 to 255), Value (0 to 255) of top threshold for brown color when using the HSV detector.
